title: Huge girlband star ‘gives away’ she’s next celeb to be announced for Strictly
description: A HUGE girlband star has dropped a major hint that she is the next celebrity to be announced for Strictly. Strictly Come Dancing 2025 will catapult onto screens up and down the country next month. …
content:
She dropped a clue that she might soon be dancing around a ballroom shortly

SOMETHING NEW Huge girlband star ‘gives away’ she’s the next celeb to be announced for Strictly

A HUGE girlband star has dropped a major hint that she is the next celebrity to be announced for Strictly.

Strictly Come Dancing 2025 will catapult onto screens up and down the country next month.

The line up for the hit BBC One series has started to be unveiled, with FOUR huge names announced on Monday.

Olympian and Gladiators star Harry Aikines-Aryeetey was the first celebrity confirmed.

Harry AKA Nitro's signing for Strictly was shortly followed by the announcements for Love Island star Dani Dyer, Doctor Who actress Alex Kingston and former footballer Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink.

Fans are now convinced that Girls Aloud star Nicola Roberts will be announced as the fifth star for this year's Strictly.

In a Masked Singer Reddit forum, one person asked: "Queen Bee for Strictly 2025??" after Nicola won the show in 2020 as Queen Bee.

The fan went on: "Nicola will be sharing some 'news' on The Scott Mills Breakfast Show on Tuesday 12th August.

"Could this be about Strictly, Girls Aloud or even a possible 2nd album?"

Nicola is due to appear on the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show with Scott Mills on Tuesday.

On the radio show's website, it teases: "Nicola Roberts has got news...".

It also states: "Scott's catching up with Girls Aloud's Nicola Roberts, she's got some big news to share."

In 2022, Nicola did the Strictly Come Dancing Christmas special - which is how some of the main show stars get selected.

Last year, The Sun reported that Strictly would have loved to have had Nicola on the show for the 2024 season.

A source said at the time: "Nicola is a beautiful dancer with amazing musicality.

"She was really impressive on the Strictly special and her waltz was beautiful.

"They’d love to have Nicola back and the offer is there for her.

"She has got a jam-packed summer with Girls Aloud but Strictly think she could be amazing if she fancied a whirl."

So, could she be lined up for this year's series?

Nicola, who was partnered with Giovanni Pernice when she competed in the Christmas competition three years ago.

Speaking about her time on the show previously, she said: "I said I wanted fun and it has been fun."

When she competed in the festive series, she was beaten to the Christmas Glitterball trophy by EastEnders actor Jamie Borthwick.

Jamie ended up winning the Christmas special in 2022, before heading onto the main show last year in the 2024 season to compete.

Many Christmas series stars end up competing in the main series of the hit show.

Harry AKA Nitro is just another example of a former Christmas special alum getting recruited for the main series.

He took park in the Christmas special last year, and was the first celebrity unveiled for this year's core line up.
summary: A huge girlband star, Nicola Roberts, has hinted that she may be the next celebrity to be announced for Strictly Come Dancing 2025. The line up for the hit BBC One series, which will debut on screens next month, has already been announced with four major celebrities, including Olympic and Gladiators star Harry Aikines-Aryeetey, Love Island star Dani Dyer, Doctor Who actress Alex Kingston and former footballer Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink. Fans are now convinced that Roberts will be announced as the fifth star for this year's Strictle. She is set to appear on the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show with Scott Mills on Tuesday, which hints at a potential 2nd album.
shortSummary: A huge girlband star, Nicola Roberts, hinted at being the next celebrity to be announced for Strictly Come Dancing 2025, with several confirmed signings including Harry Aikines-Aryeetey.
argos_summary: A hint has emerged that Nicola Roberts, a member of Girls Aloud, may be the next celebrity announced for the upcoming season of Strictly Come Dancing. The speculation follows her appearance on The Scott Mills Breakfast Show, where she is expected to share significant news. Previously, Nicola participated in the Strictly Christmas special and impressed producers, leading to rumors that they would love to have her on the main show.
